header.info: Show for specific products, collections, tags, types or leave empty to show on all product pages.

enable_disable.content: [Log in](https://theme.debutify.com/add_ons) to your Debutify login portal to enable/disable an add-on.

paragraph__2.content: To edit languages, go to Themes > Actions > Edit languages > Add-ons.

paragraph__1.content: The transparent header will be applied to homepage slideshow section as well as collection pages with images.

show_language_selector.label: Show language selector
show_language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [languages settings](/admin/settings/languages).

show_country_selector.label: Show country selector
show_country_selector.info: To add a country, go to your [market settings](/admin/settings/markets).

border_radius.label: Border radius
border_radius.info: Set max value to get perfect circe.

show_dynamic_checkout_buttons.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout_buttons.info: Each customer will see their preferred payment method from those available on your store, such as PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_more_payment_options_button.label: Show more payment options button
show_more_payment_options_button.info: Dynamic checkout button must be enabled.

overlay_z_index.label: Overlays z-index
overlay_z_index.info: Increase that number if you have 3rd-party App's element showing over your cart drawer.

share_messenger.label: Share on Messenger
share_messenger.info: Messenger will only shows on mobile. Make sure to add your Facebook page ID below.

heading_font.label: Font
heading_font.info: Selecting different fonts can affect the speed of your online store. Learn more about [system fonts](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts).

text_font.label: Font
text_font.info: Selecting different fonts can affect the speed of your online store. Learn more about [system fonts](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts).

header__3.info: Configure font settings for menus and buttons.

accent_font.label: Font
accent_font.info: Selecting different fonts can affect the speed of your online store. Learn more about [system fonts](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts).

google_tag_manager.label: Google Tag Manager ID
google_tag_manager.info: Adding Google Tag Manager to your site may affect page speed. [Learn more](https://blog.dareboost.com/en/2018/04/how-tag-managers-impact-web-performance)

review_show_in_product_grid.label: Show in product grid
review_show_in_product_grid.info: These badges might also need to be enabled from within your Review app settings.

dbtfy_color_swatches_section_options.label: Product section variant options
dbtfy_color_swatches_section_options.info: Add variant options name with comma-separated.

dbtfy_color_swatches_grid_options.label: Product grid variant options
dbtfy_color_swatches_grid_options.info: Color swatches will be applied to all variant options with this name.

paragraph__1.content: When enabled, the native Shopify Payment multi-currency converter will be disabled. Note that Shopify doesn't allow us to convert the prices on the Checkout page.

dbtfy_custom_currencies_supported_curren.label: Supported currencies
dbtfy_custom_currencies_supported_curren.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](https://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

dbtfy_delivery_date_exclude_days.label: Delivery exclude days
dbtfy_delivery_date_exclude_days.info: Use the MON,TUE,WED,THU,FRI,SAT and SUN. Separate exclude days with commas.

dbtfy_facebook_messenger_code.label: Code
dbtfy_facebook_messenger_code.info: How to get code? Go to your Facebook page > Settings > Messaging > Add Messenger to your website > Copy & paste the code snippet.

dbtfy_infinite_scroll_loading_image.label: Loading image for endless scroll
dbtfy_infinite_scroll_loading_image.info: Leave empty to display the default loading icon.

dbtfy_inventory_quantity_threshold.label: Threshold quantity
dbtfy_inventory_quantity_threshold.info: If product quantity is higher than the threshold set, then hide product inventory quantity or show a general text.

dbtfy_shop_protect_disable_best_selling.label: Disable best selling collection
dbtfy_shop_protect_disable_best_selling.info: Make sure your collections are not sorted by best selling. [Edit collection sorting](/admin/collections)

header__1.info: Add more than one message to enable the carousel.

text.info: Use {amount} variable to put a cart goal.

goal_amount.label: Goal amount
goal_amount.info: e.g. 70 or 70.99. Set up your free [shipping rates](/admin/settings/shipping) matching the amount entered above.

header__1.info: Possible values: All, Africa, Antarctica, Asia, Europe, North america, Oceania, South america.

header__2.info: Use Alpha-2 code to target to specific country from the [country codes](https://www.iban.com/country-codes) list.

goal_region.label: Region
goal_region.info: Enter continent name or country code, e.g: Europe or DE.

goal_amount.label: Goal amount
goal_amount.info: e.g. 70 or 70.99. Set up your free [shipping rates](/admin/settings/shipping) matching the amount entered above.

show_at_checkout.label: Show at checkout
show_at_checkout.info: Captured information will be shown in the order summary on the checkout pages if enabled.

show_at_checkout.label: Show at checkout
show_at_checkout.info: Captured information will be shown in the order summary on the checkout pages if enabled.

options.label: Options
options.info: Separate your options with a comma.

show_at_checkout.label: Show at checkout
show_at_checkout.info: Captured information will be shown in the order summary on the checkout pages if enabled.

text.info: {min} - minimum amount of days for delivery, {max} - maximum amount of days for delivery.

date_format.label: Date format
date_format.info: %a %A - weekdays, %b %B - months, %d - days, %y %Y - years. Lowercase letters are for the short date format.

exclude_days.label: Delivery exclude days
exclude_days.info: Use the MON,TUE,WED,THU,FRI,SAT and SUN. Separate exclude days with commas.

cutoff_time.label: Date format
cutoff_time.info: Number only (24 hours format - 16:00:00 means 4PM) relative to timezone of seller.

show_instagram_icon.label: Show instagram icon
show_instagram_icon.info: Make sure to add your Instagram page link in Theme settings > Social medias.

access_token.label: Access token
access_token.info: A new token should be regenerated every 2 months.

link_position.label: Link position
link_position.info: Position to insert the Mega menu link in your header navigation.

link_position.label: Link position
link_position.info: Position to insert the Mega menu link in your header navigation.

heading.info: Collection name will be displayed by default.

link_position.label: Link position
link_position.info: Position to insert the Mega menu link in your header navigation.

link_position.label: Link position
link_position.info: Position to insert the Mega menu link in your header navigation.

heading.info: Blog name will be displayed by default.

link_position.label: Link position
link_position.info: Position to insert the Mega menu link in your header navigation.

time_trigger_timeout.label: Time
time_trigger_timeout.info: Popup will be displayed in X seconds.

scroll_depth_percentage.label: Scroll depth
scroll_depth_percentage.info: Popup will be displayed when customer is scrolling page by X percentages.

customer_tag.label: Tag
customer_tag.info: Tag will be added to this customer and can be used to trigger email automation.

paragraph__1.content: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

show_one_per_line.label: Show one point per line
show_one_per_line.info: Each product bullet point will be displayed on separate line.

option_name.label: Option name
option_name.info: If the field is empty, the product name will be used.

range.label: Quantity
range.info: Set the same "Minimum quantity of items" in your discount code settings.

range.label: Quantity
range.info: Set the same "Minimum quantity of items" in your discount code settings.

product_trigger.label: Product trigger
product_trigger.info: Leave both collection and product pickers empty to trigger upsell popup on all products.

information.content: Please see the links below for your account information and support channels.

billing_plans_info.content: See your current plan and change your plan anytime.

account_info.content: See your account information and settings.

articles_info.content: View our support articles and video guides.

contact_us_info.content: Contact our support team for assistance.

faq_info.content: See our frequently asked questions from customers.

feedback_info.content: See our customers feedback and submit your own.

button_link.info: If not specified, then the link will lead to the catalog page.

collection_title.label: Collection title
collection_title.info: If not specified, then the collection title will be used.

collection_image.label: Collection image
collection_image.info: If not specified, then the collection image will be used.

button_link.info: If not specified, then the link will lead to the catalog page.

enable_split_description.label: Enable split description
enable_split_description.info: This feature allows you to show a brief description under the product price. Add the shortcode [split_description] in the HTML section of your product description to split it.

show_payment_icons.label: Show payment icons
show_payment_icons.info: Add custom icons in Theme settings > Advanced settings.

logo_svg.label: SVG
logo_svg.info: It has more priority than regular image above. [How to upload an SVG file?](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5056796-how-to-upload-a-svg-file-in-debutify-theme)

customer_tag.label: Customer tag
customer_tag.info: Tag will be added to this customer and can be used to trigger email automation.

paragraph.content: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

header__3.info: Crop your logo image as close as possible for maximum size.

open_link_in_new_tab.label: Open link in a new tab

map_address.label: Map address
map_address.info: Google Maps will find the exact location.

api_key.label: API key
api_key.info: Youâ€™ll need to [register a Google Maps API Key](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/map-section-api-key) to display the map.

placeholder_image.label: Placeholder image
placeholder_image.info: Will be displayed if the map is not loaded.

display_type.label: Select collections to show
display_type.info: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collections.

sort_type.label: Sort collections by:
sort_type.info: Sorting only applies when 'All' is selected.

collections_per_page.label: Collections per page
collections_per_page.info: This settings only work, when select collections to show 'All' option.

newsletter_form_heading.info: [Tell your visitors about a launch day discount.](https://www.shopify.com/blog/15514000-14-ways-to-use-offers-coupons-discounts-and-deals-to-drive-revenue-and-customer-loyalty)

enable_split_description.label: Enable split description
enable_split_description.info: This feature allows you to show a brief description under the product price. Add the shortcode [split_description] in the HTML section of your product description to split it.

customer_tag.label: Customer tag
customer_tag.info: Tag will be added to this customer and can be used to trigger email automation.

paragraph__1.content: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

header__1.info: Because the size and shape of the slideshow depends on the size and shape of the customer's device, your slideshow images will be cropped on some screens. Try to use images that have a focal point in the middle so that the important part of each image is always visible.

slide_link.label: Slide link
slide_link.info: Adding a slide link will disable the buttons.

enable_custom_fonts.label: Enable custom fonts
enable_custom_fonts.info: Selecting a custom font will impact your page load speed.
